name: Vegan Chicken
description: These vegan chicken fingers are the perfect comfort food! They're crispy, a bit spicy, and absolutely delicious. And they're super easy to make!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Frank's Red Hot Buffalo Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Place the soy curls in a pot or large bowl and add boiling water or vegetable broth. Let them soak for 10 minutes. They will double or even triple in size.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the soy curls in a pot or large bowl and add boiling water or vegetable broth. Let them soak for 10 minutes. They will double or even triple in size.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain them and cool them down with cold running water.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain them and cool them down with cold running water.

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze out any extra water with your hands.
recipeInstructions.name: Squeeze out any extra water with your hands.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, the plant-based milk, the water, the garlic power, the paprika powder, the salt, and the black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, the plant-based milk, the water, the garlic power, the paprika powder, the salt, and the black pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir until well combined. Fill a bowl with panko bread crumbs. Dip the soy curls into the flour batter. Then roll them in the panko bread crumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir until well combined. Fill a bowl with panko bread crumbs. Dip the soy curls into the flour batter. Then roll them in the panko bread crumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Place them in your air fryer and set it to 350 °F.
recipeInstructions.name: Place them in your air fryer and set it to 350 °F.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Frank's Red Hot Buffalo Sauce in a bowl and evenly coat the soy curls from all sides by carefully stirring them a few times.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Frank's Red Hot Buffalo Sauce in a bowl and evenly coat the soy curls from all sides by carefully stirring them a few times.

recipeInstructions.text: Place them back into the air fryer and cook them for 5 more minutes at 350 °F.
recipeInstructions.name: Place them back into the air fryer and cook them for 5 more minutes at 350 °F.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, prepare the vegan ranch dip. Finely chop fresh parsley and dill. Place the vegan mayonnaise in a small bowl and add the parsley and dill. Stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, prepare the vegan ranch dip. Finely chop fresh parsley and dill. Place the vegan mayonnaise in a small bowl and add the parsley and dill. Stir until well combined.
